title: Serif logo font, resembles both Garamond-like and Charlemagne-like ones
author: Lackadaisy

comments.content:
I think it's based on a modified **[Nicolas Cochin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110319/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Elsner%2BFlake&ffam=NicolasCochinEF%20-%20Regular&fid=95979ee66e97647b4a7b5e6558536254&fsize=60&text=L%20ORDRE%20des%20DRAGONS&wrap=2)** by Georges Peignot, available from URW++, Linotype, etc  
The /O looks like a custom design
Thanks, iI guess it is true. Nicolas Cochin fits up to 99%. R may be cut from another font.
